New Records: Paul Skenes recorded his 16th game with seven or more strikeouts, surpassing Larry McWilliams (1983) for seventh-most by a Pirates starter in a season.
Key Match Events: Oneil Cruz hit his 21st homer in the first inning
Nick Yorkeâ€™s first career homer off Fernando Cruz in the fifth inning gave the Pirates a two-run lead.
Pre-Game Insights: This was Skenes' third start against the Reds.
Post-Match Reflections: Skenes said, 'Obviously, the third time seeing them, you gotta get them out in different ways than you have in the past.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Reds lost by shutout for the 14th time this season and for the second time when Skenes started.
Others: Hunter Greene made his first start since having his season interrupted by right elbow soreness in mid-August.
